PHASE SUMMARY — Fernand Mondego — middle

Role: 
- Guest at a dinner party

Traits:
- None explicitly mentioned in this phase

Relationships:
- Host of the dinner party (implied, but not directly stated)
- M. de Morcerf (his father, invited to the dinner party)
- Madame de Morcerf (his mother, mentioned as the reason for M. de Morcerf's absence)

Notable behaviors:
- Excused himself from attending the dinner party due to his mother's obligations.
